resource-aws-vpn-gateway-attachment:
Resource: aws_vpn_gateway_attachment

Provides a Virtual Private Gateway attachment resource, allowing for an existing
hardware VPN gateway to be attached and/or detached from a VPC.

-> Note: The aws_vpn_gateway
resource can also automatically attach the Virtual Private Gateway it creates
to an existing VPC by setting the vpc_id attribute accordingly.
example-usage:
Example Usage

terraform
resource "aws_vpc" "network" {
cidr_block = "10.0.0.0/16"
}


resource "aws_vpn_gateway" "vpn" {
tags = {
Name = "example-vpn-gateway"
}
}


resource "aws_vpn_gateway_attachment" "vpn_attachment" {
vpc_id = aws_vpc.network.id
vpn_gateway_id = aws_vpn_gateway.vpn.id
}


See Virtual Private Cloud
and Virtual Private Gateway user
guides for more information.
argument-reference:
Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

  • vpc_id - (Required) The ID of the VPC.
  • vpn_gateway_id - (Required) The ID of the Virtual Private Gateway.
attribute-reference:
Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

  • vpc_id - The ID of the VPC that Virtual Private Gateway is attached to.
  • vpn_gateway_id - The ID of the Virtual Private Gateway.
description:
